channel.title: separation on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in separation on Rusland 1

item.title: Кукрыниксы – No Big Deal (Это не беда)
item.description: Горшенев From Кукрыниксы (Kukryniksy), a Saint Petersburg band now defunct, with Это не беда (1999) as their most well-known legacy (along with Чёрная невеста, Знай, and Колдовство). The new band of lead singer Алексей Горшенёв (1975, brother of Михаил) is called Горшенев.

item.title: TапОК – Every Day is Winter
item.description: And then, the холодильник (fridge) and the кошелёк (wallet) are also пустой (empty). From Гроза Танцполов, released in 2017. Text More about TапОК or TapOK on Facebook and VK. Recent (2020) is the album Кончало. Listen via Apple Music, Spotify, or YouTube (Playlist).

item.title: Ssshhhiiittt! – Don’t Miss Me (Не скучай)
item.description: While you keep living, I’m drowning in shit. Sorry for everything, and please, Don’t ever miss me. Text, translation From ssshhhiiittt! (3 x s, 3 x h, 3 x i, and 3 x t) from Yaroslavl. Thanks to Sergey Vasiliev, the fan who created this great фан-клип (fan clip).
